title: Ticket #1196: LOCAL_CONFIG_DIR not traversed if defined in LOCAL_CONFIG_FILE
description: The LOCAL_CONFIG_DIR parameter defines a directory that should include files with condor configuration parameters. If defined in condor's main configuration file, it works as expected. If defined in the file pointed to by the LOCAL_CONFIG_FILE the directory is not traversed (ie no params listed in files inside LOCAL_CONFIG_DIR are recognized by condor).
check_ins: 2010-Feb-10 10:11   Check-in [17170]: Fixed problem processing LOCAL_CONFIG_DIR if it is defined in the file pointed to by LOCAL_CONFIG_FILE. The code was attempting to save processing time by only processing the LOCAL_CONFIG_DIR value if it is different after processing LOCAL_CONFIG_FILE than it was before LOCAL_CONFIG_FILE.
